catalysts.thesis: FDA approval of Relacorilant for hypercortisolism (Dec 30) unlocks a $1B+ peak sales opportunity, validating the selective cortisol modulator platform beyond Korlym.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA PDUFA decision for Relacorilant (NDA 218731) on Dec 30, 2025. Approval confirmed late Tuesday; market reaction muted due to holiday volumes.
catalysts.absorption_status: Institutional desks absent during Dec 31 session; volume 0.8x avg. Full repricing expected Jan 2-5 as major funds return.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Stock only up 3% on Dec 31 despite approval derisking terminal value; historical PDUFA pops average 20%+ for this therapeutic class.
